It is possible to make your own algorithm and use the exisiting parameters.


*Example 1 - Create an algorithm using the year parameter*
{{{
String algebra = "((year+year)*2)-10";
Password algebraPassword = ExtendedPassword.createPassword("pAss", algebra);

// if the year is 2011, then the result will be 'abid8034'
System.out.println(algebraPassword.getEvaluatedPassword());
}}}

*Example 2 - Create an algorithm ysing the year and zodiac parameter*
{{{
String algebra = "(year-10)+zodiac";
MutablePassword algebraPassword = ExtendedPassword.createPassword("pAss", algebra);

// if the date is Jan 2011 then the result will be 'pAss2001Aquarius'
System.out.println(algebraPassword.getEvaluatedPassword());

// Next month the password changes to 'pAss2001Pisces'
// and next year it will be 'pAss2002Aquarius'
// So the password changes monthly and on a yearly basis
}}}
